Name: Arif
description:
Arif is 43 years old, married and has three children. He works on a farm which he inherited from his parents.

Arif is applying for loan of AZN 800 to pay for his childâ€™s wedding party. His eldest child, a daughter, is getting married and he wants to organize a cheery wedding in according with our cultural traditions.

In the future, he hopes that he can purchase more farmland to expand business and help his other two children's dreams and plans.
